body.name: Band-Aid Brand Flexible Fabric Adhesive Bandages for Comfortable Flexible Protection, Twin Pack, 2 x 100 ct
body.couponInfo: Save an extra 20% on your first Subscribe and Save order.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 15 hrs 22 mins
features: Twin pack containing two boxes of 100-count each of Band-Aid Brand Flexible Fabric Adhesive Bandages in assorted sizes for first aid and wound protection of minor wounds, cuts, scrapes and burns

Made with Memory-Weave fabric for comfort and flexibility, these bandages stretch, bend, and flex with your skin as you move, and include a Quilt-Aid Comfort Pad designed to cushion painful wounds which may help prevent reinjury

These Band-Aid Brand Flexible Fabric adhesive bandages stay on for up to 24 hours and feature a unique Hurt-Free Pad that won't stick to the wound as they wick away blood and fluids, allowing for gentle removal
Band-Aid Brand Adhesive Bandages help protect against dirt and germs that may cause infection. Plus, wounds covered with a bandage heal faster than uncovered wounds.
Apply bandage to clean, dry skin for minor wound care and change daily, when wet or as needed. For proper wound care, treat with wound an antiseptic ointment such as Neosporin prior to application.
body.description: Try Band-Aid Brand Flexible Fabric Adhesive Bandages, which cover and protect minor wounds. Made with Memory-Weave fabric for comfort and flexibility, these assorted wound care bandages stretch, bend, and flex as you move. Each bandage features a Quilt-Aid Comfort Pad designed to cushion painful wounds which may help prevent reinjury. Made with a Hurt-Free Pad, these comfortable first-aid bandages won't stick to the wound as they wick away blood and fluids, allowing for gentle removal. From the #1 doctor recommended bandage brand, Band-Aid Brand Adhesive Bandages help protect against dirt and germs that may cause infection. Plus wounds covered with a bandage heal faster than uncovered wounds. For proper wound care, treat with wound an antiseptic ointment such as Neosporin prior to application.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Multiple Sizes a Must
reviews.reviewText: Band-Aid Brand Flexible Fabric Adhesive Bandages are an absolute lifesaver to have on hand, especially with kids around. This Twin Pack of 2 x 100 ct. ensures that we are well-prepared for any little mishaps that may occur. The flexible fabric provides comfortable and reliable protection, conforming to various contours of the body for a secure fit. The assortment of multiple sizes is a must-have feature, catering to different wounds and ensuring we have the right bandage for any situation. These bandages have proven to be durable and stay in place, offering peace of mind during playtime or everyday activities. A true essential for any household with kids, the Band-Aid Brand Flexible Fabric Adhesive Bandages are a reliable and versatile solution for minor cuts and scrapes.

reviews.reviewText: Ordering and delivery process spot on. Excellent product,, decent price point. These are quality made, not cheapest, and do their job very well. No negatives. Recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best king of bandaid
reviews.reviewText: Flexible strips are the best. You never know what will be in stock at the grocery store or pharmacy. Here instead of being stuck you can get exactly what you want. No water trips. No frustration.These go on easy and stay on. High quality fabric/material. Unless in one of those store that nothing stays on for a long time these stay on all day. You can have them as tight or as loose as you like.

reviews.reviewText: Great assortment of bandaids. Good quality, good adhesion. Good value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased a pack of Band Aid Brand Flexible Fabric Adhesive Bandages and I'm extremely satisfied with their performance. As someone who is prone to cuts and scrapes, I was looking for a high-quality and reliable adhesive bandage, and these have definitely delivered.One of the things I love most about the Band Aid Brand Flexible Fabric Adhesive Bandages is the comfort and flexibility they provide. The fabric material is very soft and conforms to the shape of my skin, which makes them comfortable to wear for long periods of time. The bandages are also very flexible, which allows me to move and bend without feeling restricted.I also appreciate the durability of these bandages. They stay in place very well and don't slip or fall off, even when I'm very active. The adhesive is also gentle and doesn't cause any irritation or sensitivity, which is a common problem with other bandages I've tried.Overall, I'm extremely satisfied with the Band Aid Brand Flexible Fabric Adhesive Bandages and I highly recommend them to anyone who needs a reliable and comfortable adhesive bandage. They're a high-quality and effective option that will stay in place and provide long-lasting protection.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 30, 2023

reviews.reviewText: Je betaalt wat, maar je krijgt ook terug, de beste pleisters dat er bestaan, weet niet waarom de Europese pleisters niet op dezelfde niveau zijn, wat is zo moeilijk om goede pleisters te maken? Als je die een keer probeert, wil je nooit meer een andere brand. Voorlopig blijf ik Band Aid bestellen.

Me gusta estas tiritas porque se adhieren muy bien y protegen correctamente la herida. Se quitan limpiamente. Son flexible, así que cada uno puede regular la tensión de sujeción. Hay varias medidas en cada caja. 100 apositos en total.

Buscaba unas bandas adhesivas que tuvieran un tono lo más similar posible a mi tono de piel, ya que las necesitaba para un área del cuello que estaría muy visible. Intenté otras marcas de productos antes pero el tono era demasiado "rosa". Estas Band-Aid fueron el tono ideal para mi, ya que tienen un tono de piel ligeramente bronceada. Pegan muy bien, duran bastante y la caja tiene una gran cantidad de distintos útiles tamaños. Con esta dotación tengo para muchos años de reserva.
